hero.title: One Plan,
hero.description: Stay connected in over 90+ countries with a single eSIM plan. No roaming fees, no complicated setup, instant access to high-speed data wherever you go.

features.subtitle: Romio eSIM replaces your traditional phone plan with a monthly subscription that gives you instant data access the moment you land.

global.title: Global Coverage in 90+ Countries
global.description: Stay connected across Europe, North America, Asia, and more — with one plan, one QR code.

subscription.title: Monthly Subscription Plans
subscription.description: Choose from 5GB, 15GB, or 30GB plans, starting at $19.99/month. Plans automatically renew and can be canceled anytime.

activation.title: Instant Activation
activation.description: Just scan your QR code and go. No physical SIM, no store visits, no delays.

usage.title: Use at Home and Abroad
usage.description: Romio works in your home country and while traveling, making it ideal for full-time travelers, remote workers, or long-stay expats.

keepNumber.title: Keep Your Number (Coming Soon)
keepNumber.description: Add our VoIP plan to keep your phone number, take calls over data, and use apps like WhatsApp without interruption.

topUp.title: No Roaming Fees
topUp.description: Enjoy local data rates in all covered countries. No surprise bills or expensive roaming charges.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works for you

lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Perfect for light users who need basic connectivity for messaging, emails, and occasional browsing. Great for staying connected without heavy data usage.

traveler.name: Pro
traveler.description: Perfect for professionals and regular users who need reliable connectivity for work, video calls, streaming, and social media. Ideal for those who work online or need consistent access.

max.name: Max
max.description: Best for digital nomads and business travelers who need unlimited connectivity across the globe. Perfect for heavy data usage.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our service
faq.a1: An eSIM is a digital SIM that allows you to activate a cellular plan without having to use a physical SIM card. It's built into most newer smartphones and enables easier switching between carriers.
faq.q2: Is my device compatible with eSIM?
faq.a2: Most newer smartphones (iPhone XS and newer, Google Pixel 3 and newer, Samsung Galaxy S20 and newer) support eSIM technology. You can check your phone's specifications or contact us to verify compatibility.
faq.q3: How do I activate my eSIM?
faq.a3: After purchase, you'll receive a QR code via email. On your phone, go to Settings > Cellular/Mobile > Add Cellular/Mobile Plan, then scan the QR code. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete activation.
faq.q4: Can I use my eSIM and physical SIM at the same time?
faq.a4: Yes! That's one of the benefits of eSIM technology. You can keep your regular SIM active for calls and texts, while using the eSIM for data when traveling.
faq.q5: What happens when my data runs out?
faq.a5: When your data allocation is exhausted, you can purchase additional data through your account dashboard or set up auto-renewal to avoid interruptions.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account dashboard. There are no cancellation fees or long-term contracts.

plans.liteOverview: Romio Lite is built for travelers who just need the essentials — messages, maps, emails, and light browsing. Whether you're popping over to Europe for a few days or hitting a weekend in Mexico, this plan gives you seamless coverage without the hassle of SIM swaps or roaming charges.
plans.travelerOverview: Romio Pro is your monthly passport to reliable global connectivity. With 15GB of high-speed data and no contracts, it's ideal for work, social media, navigation, and content on the go. It's the plan most Romio users stick with long term — just enough power, not too much fluff.
plans.proOverview: Romio Pro is your monthly passport to reliable global connectivity. With 15GB of high-speed data and no contracts, it's ideal for work, social media, navigation, and content on the go. It's the plan most Romio users stick with long term — just enough power, not too much fluff.
plans.maxOverview: Romio Max was made for people who live online — from airports and cafés to islands and coworking hubs. With 30GB of global data, it supports everything from heavy video usage to hotspotting your laptop. It's your full-time data plan that works across borders without skipping a beat.

features.instantDelivery: Instant eSIM delivery via QR code
features.streaming: Supports streaming, uploading, Zoom, and more
features.remoteWork: Designed for remote work, travel, and hybrid life
features.addons: VoIP (coming soon) and insurance add-ons available

plans.travelerWhyPopular: The Pro plan strikes the perfect balance between affordability and capacity. Most subscribers find that 15GB gives them more than enough data for a month of regular use, including video calls, streaming, and navigation, without the premium price of our Max plan.
plans.proWhyPopular: The Pro plan strikes the perfect balance between affordability and capacity. Most subscribers find that 15GB gives them more than enough data for a month of regular use, including video calls, streaming, and navigation, without the premium price of our Max plan.
plans.voipDescription: Keep your phone number while traveling with our VoIP service. Make and receive calls using your home number from anywhere.
plans.insuranceDescription: Protect your devices against loss or damage with our global device protection plan, valid in any country your eSIM works.
plans.maxConclusion: The Max plan is built for those who need uncompromising connectivity. When your livelihood, content creation, or digital lifestyle depends on having stable internet, Max gives you the headroom you need without constantly worrying about hitting data limits.
